Lack enough support: The expert mentions that they were not able to verify the authenticity of one of the quotations attributed to Ingrid Newkirk, despite it being widely shared online for around a decade.
Contradict fact: The expert states that the meme presents one of the quotations without proper context, grossly misrepresenting the full sense of Ingrid Newkirk's remarks.
Problematic assumption: The expert highlights that the meme attributes a statement to Ingrid Newkirk as a direct quotation when it was actually reported as a summary of her alleged remarks.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert provides alternative explanations for some of the claims made in the meme, such as the context of the article regarding the arrests of PETA employees and the treatment of animals in an animal shelter.
